import { Component } from '@angular/core' import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http' @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent { public eventos: any; widthImg: number = 70; marginImg: number = 2; showImg: boolean = true; constructor(private http: HttpClient){ console.log(this.showImg) } ngOnInit(){ this.getEventos() } public getEventos(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/Evento').subscribe({ next: (res) => { this.eventos = res console.log(res) }, error: (err) => console.log(err) })} public updateShowImage(input: boolean){ this.showImg = input } }
